S.FORM: Sri lanka hya' ga cyux maki' tay 7 00 N, 81 00 E na Aziya' syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 65,610 sq km (maki' tay 122ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 64,630 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 980 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 22.235 million. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 43.50 , lhlahuy hya' ga 29.40 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 27.10 . spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Colombo. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 4 na tay sazing byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Maithripala Sirisena, aring ryax 9 squ byacing tay 1 sa kawas 2015 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
